resources.string: Go back to the main wing and enter the library!
Make the escape, a helicopter will pick you up on the neighbouring rooftop.
Keep the cops at bay while Bain comes up with a backup plan.
Help the mechanic collect special parts
Search the biolab for the correct chemicals to create a corrosive compound.
Tell the IT technician to resume the security lockdown override.
Use ziplines in the elevator shaft to reach the surface. You can also stay and find more loot.
Place the box on the conveyor
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to pick the powerbox lock
Locate the missing server in the IT Department. It should be in one of the offices.
Kill the guard inside the security room.
Alarm tripped: Police detected an explosion
Prevent the cops from interrupting the hack.
The wheel is broken, you need to restart it!
Press $BTN_INTERACT; to push in the frog symbol
Look for the keycards, you need two of them to get that vault open, remember to check the tellers.
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to reignite the thermal drill
Get into the car and escape along with Hajrudin.
Grab the VR headset for Vlad!
Retrieve the equipment Locke has arranged.
The EMP knocked out the test subjects, find them and get them to the scanner. They should be dressed in blue.
Follow the mechanic to the truck
Water pump nearby will easily fill the wagon. Connect the hose with pump first and then keep extending it until you reach the wagon!
Use $BTN_INTERACT; to shout at civilians and keep them in check.
Can't enter the vehicle while carrying loot
The EMP has opened the way down to the labs, get down there!
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to search for the files
Hold out until Bain finds an escape
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to take the Tin Boy toy
Use a flare to mark the pick up location.
The cops have interrupted the hack. Restart it.
The ship needs more fuel for it to reach international waters. Drag a hose from the tank to the ship so we can start pumping fuel in to it.
Looks like Charon is in trouble look for suspicious activity.
Find the Operations Room where the main FBI intelligence servers are kept.
Throw the packages underneath the tree to secure them!
Place a flare to signal the escape helicopter.
Send up the Balloon so George can fly in and pick up the Ejection Seat.
Wait for the hack to finish and make sure the power stays on.
Rig the detonator to the breaching charges and arm it.
You need to escape from the mansion.
Find evidence the FBI will use against you and secure it. It should be scattered throughout the house.
Alarm tripped: Camera detected a criminal
Fight your way to the overhead control room.
You need to locate some kind of note that shows which guard has the keycard.
Open the safe by the counter to access the VR headset.
Jacket has never spoken a word to the other heisters without using his tape recorder.
Find the telephone pole connected to the mansion.
Retrieve the encrypted flash drive containing the access codes from the laptop in the office.
Dip the explosive in and enjoy the show! You might want stand back a bit though.
Use the stationary computer and open the vault door
Jump into the train to escape. There is also more loot back in the warehouse.
Locate wire boxes and cut the colored cables. Make sure to cut the correct ones, or the alarm will go off!
Time to leave. Gather on the boat.
Attach the chain to both the truck and the teller windows.
Use the terminal to upload shipping information to Bain, which he'll use to try and track the correct truck.
Press $BTN_INTERACT; to take the muriatic acid
Wait for the helicopter to arrive
Press $BTN_INTERACT; to push in the snake symbol
Hoxton needs access to the main FBI intelligence servers in the Operations Room. The servers have the information that you need.
There is some evidence related to the traitor that isn't present on the servers. Locate the Forensics Department.
Right clicking whilst zoomed in with a Bow weapon will cancel your shot.
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to spike and pick up the bottle
Find the last number for the vault access code. One is held by the manager, one by the pit boss and the other by the head of security.
Recover the prototype turret parts by carrying them to the drop off location.
Use the drill parts to set up the Beast.
Escape in the truck, but you must need your car.
Let the thermite paste do its magic. It's chewing through thick metal but it shouldn't take too long.
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to connect the cable to the power socket
Bring the loot to the escape vehicle
The crane is moving the trap now, wait for it to get into place.
Press $BTN_INTERACT; start copying the guest list
Find one of the sewer entrances in the town. Climb down, and fight to the exit.
There's a chainsaw somewhere around, find it!
Some guards have a set patrol during Stealth, use this to your advantage.
Figure out which engine it is
Press $BTN_INTERACT; to take the hydrogen chloride
Locate Bain in Cell Block A
Make yourself feel at home and wait for Bain to call you
Remove the police stingers from the truck's path.
Locate and get into the hidden vault
Get to the van to escape, or stay if you want to grab more loot.
Find the code to the bank's vault.
Put a doctor bag on the ground and heal yourself.
Alarm tripped: Civilian heard an explosion and called the police
Collect the evidence and pile it up on the floor outside the room so you can burn it.
All elves are dead! Time to leave!
Attach the C4 to the safe using the hole you just drilled. Let the water and explosion force the safe open from within!
Hoxton needs encryption keys to access the next server. They can be found in the Security Office.
Step inside the basement to proceed
Press $BTN_INTERACT; to free yourself from the taser
The wine we're after is in one of the red gift boxes in the store. Open them and find the wine!
Go back to the van and pick up C4. Place it on the street outside to prepare the escape.
Keep looting the vault if you want, or make your escape.
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to take loot from the vehicle
Press $BTN_INTERACT; to pick up the keycard
Find the last number used for the vault code
Get the IT guy to the server room
Killing cops is important, but you can't complete a heist without clearing objectives.
Bain doesn't approve of needless killing of civilians.
Gain access to the server room
Caution! Guards may see your gun this close!
Using Bain's Brain, Taxman's insider knowledge and the team's charms - get the IRS data base hacked for a huge tax cut.
Take the bomb parts to the boat
Hold out and wait for the helicopter.
Cut the fence to gain entry into the compound.
The cops have turned off the power to the security computer. Throw the switch to turn it back on!
Find the server room - it's on the second floor. Unlock the door using the keycard.
You will need hostages! Tie down civilians with $BTN_INTERACT; to take them hostage.
Alarm tripped: Police detected a hostage
Press TAB to get more info on your objectives
Find something to bridge the gap
Gage Mod Courier Packages will grant the team a free EXP bonus, regardless if they own the Gage Mod Courier DLC or not.
The BFD will drill down through the Gambling Hall and into the vault. Start her up!
Drill the vault door to get it open.
You can select the ammo bag in your inventory and press $BTN_USE_ITEM; to place it.
Provide the weapon with fresh batteries.
Press $BTN_INTERACT; to take the thermite paste
Get in the elevator, start it and wait until it reaches the roof.
Breach the trainyard and locate the Murkywater Trains inside.
Search through the mall for a shopping bag containing the tin toy. They should be scattered around the stores.
Take the bomb parts from the containers and take them to the boat.
Find two more numbers for the armory access code. One is held by the manager, one by the pit boss and the other by the head of security.
Wait for the poison to work
Open the safe using the manager's fingerprint and take the key.
Ammunition is more important than you think. Prioritize Special Enemies, such as Medics, Cloakers, Tasers and Bulldozers.
Wait until the server is exposed before you hit them! That server is the only way to make our transaction!
Time to get what we came for; place some C4 and blow open that floor!
The Breacher Skill Subtree focuses on opening doors, safes, and vaults quickly. It also upgrades the Trip Mines.
Search the Archive for Hoxton's case file.
Secure more loot in the getaway van or escape!
The Butcher's family has been running guns for several generations.
Take the necklace from behind the bullet proof glass and secure it for Vlad!
Grab the Thermal Lance which Bile has dropped nearby.
Find two more numbers for the vault access code. One is held by the manager, one by the pit boss and the other by the head of security.
$TEAMMATE; has been released from custody thanks to $HELPER;!
Open the Panic Room using the Thermal Lance in order to reach the traitor who's inside.
Contact the FBI HQ and request the code
Press $BTN_INTERACT; to push in the spider symbol
The hacking was interupted. They have an external override. Find it and cut it.
Alarm tripped: Civilian saw a hacked computer and called the police
The saw has finished. Remove it!
Find the system access point so Bain can hack into it and unlock the security door.
Metal detectors can instantly detect your gear. Bypass them by disabling the electricity. You are searching for electricity boxes.
You need to open the house up. Find the switch that controls the doors and windows.
You guys remember that sketchy old warehouse on the docks? Where Murkywater were smuggling in loot? Well, we're headed back there.
Pick up the thermal drill in the parking lot
The Commissar will call Bain through a hotline. This way Bain can track his position to find out where exactly he is hiding at.
Enemies will see you from far away if you are standing up. Crouch to stay out of their view.
Give him a whack over the head and tie him to the chair!
We're going to need some ammo to go with the turret. Twenty bags should do it. Same drop off point.
Plant the c4 on the van doors and blow them open.
Destroying cameras reduces the police's intel on you.
Hack into a security panel on the side of the trains to open the main doors.
Meet up with Bain on the rooftop
Get the bags into the drop-off zone.
Bring the server to the escape vehicle
Cloakers are immune to ECM feedback.
Plant the coke infront of the vault door
Lift the gold out of here
Find out where the contaminated patient is
Captain Winters will retreat when he has taken enough damage or if several of his men have fallen.
Find the last number for the armory access code. One is held by the manager, one by the pit boss and the other by the head of security.
Alarm tripped: Police detected a saw
Bain will offer smaller jobs that can be completed both Loud or in Stealth. They can often be done quick and he has a few good jobs for beginners.
Sydney's old street gang, the Dingos, are still operating back in Melbourne.
Locate the money pallet that has landed somewhere in the town. Check the roofs and interiors.
We need that saw to free the captain of the ship. Grab it
Wait for the timelock to open the security gate.
Find the safe with money in it
The guest's bottle is empty. Bring him a fresh one, spiked with the poison. Look for the bottles in the casino's bars and put poison in it. Remember to get the drink he likes.
Perk Decks can change the way you play drastically. Choose one that fits your playstyle.
The Elephant sends his regards and left a little gift for you. Make sure you pick it up before you leave - because you are worth it.
Wait until Bain find a way out of there.
Prevent your escape being tracked by using C4 to destroy Murkywater's radar and communication equipment.
Find the safe with money in it
Find out which railcar contains the prototype turret and break into it.
Locke has supplied vital equipment in three crates. The crates are marked with a strobe light.
Set up fake sentry guns to keep the civilians in check.
Find two more numbers for the armory code
Find a use for the keycard inside the evidence room!
Bain has been released from his cell and is heading to the rooftop through the canteen, follow him!
Start drilling through the vault door.
Alarm tripped: Civilian encountered a sentry gun and called the police
Bodhi used to be a member of a gang called the Ex-Presidents.
Look for gasoline, fertilizer, wires, and some kind of timer.
Find a piece of tape to use for copying the bank manager's fingerprint.
Pour out the thermite to melt the floor
Find and collect a memory stick
Look for paintings that have the red "sold" sticker on them
Light the flare to signal the escape vehicle.
Throw the engine into the helicopter and wait for it to be analyzed
Charon is in trouble. Find a way down to the basement and meet up with him.
Grab the soda from the vending machine and deliver it to the mechanic.
I saw a few artifacts lying about, there's always more room for extra loot.
Find the panic room which is somewhere inside the FBI safe house. The traitor is held inside.
Use the helicopter to secure extra loot and escape the apartment building.
The helicopter has arrived! Escort the pilot to it.
If the escape is available, remember to leave when you think it's best. All that money won't be worth it if you get thrown into custody.
Fight through the apartments to catch the Commissar!
Use the keypad to start the time lock on the door which will open the security gate to the vault area.
Press $BTN_INTERACT; to turn on the TV
Kill the sniper in the building across the street.
The bollards are blocking the truck. Open the doors inside the garage to find the control room, and lower the bollards.
We have everything we came for. Get out of here now.
Take the bomb parts to the van
Attach the cars to the helicopter's magnet so that Bile can lift them up.
Rotate the weapon to face the door to the storage area.
Observe and try to figure out which patient is the contaminated one.
Escort the CFO to the roof so that Bain can pick him up and extort him.
Press $BTN_INTERACT; while looking at a target to spot them.
Get a gas can and put it on the tire pit. It will create a smoke screen.
Listen to the directions given by the stage manager. Press the buttons when he says and put on a good show!
Take the paintings to the van
You need a BFD tool to fix the BFD
Get the coke to the pick-up truck
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to take the alarm clock
Use the computer to give Bain access to their network
Enter the Dockyard and start looking for the 2 keycards.
Locate the plane keys somewhere in the compound.
Search the mainframe for the next case.
Wait for the mechanic to complete assembling the bike part you collected for him. He will tell you what to do next.
Take the bomb parts to the helicopter
Collect the needed parts and repair the drill.
The mechanic waits for you to grab his equipment!
Find and enter the tech store on the ground floor.
The Gunslinger Skill Subtree specializes in Pistols.
Look around you and check if your teammates have placed equipment nearby. It is usually not as beneficial to place all equipment in the same place.
Search and find the server room, look for Gensec signs
Get the server from the limo and make your way to the transfer room to plug it in.
Hold out until the helicopter arrives to lift you out.
Holding the "Melee" button allows you to charge Melee weapons for a more powerful attack.
The main server doors are now open, steal the hard drive!
Input the vault codes and open the vault.
Use the flare on the run way to call down the helicopter
Disable the turrets by cutting the wires in the electrical boxes.
Search through the patient files until you find the correct one.
Rotate the crane so it is above the skylights
The drill has stopped. Restart it!
Disable the camera with the ECM Jammer.
Defend the computer while we hack into the garage security system.
Alarm tripped: Too many innocent casualities
Carry the loot to the helicopter
You can pour out another can of thermite to speed up the process.
Signal a helicopter to come in and get you out of the museum.
Cut the alarm wires to the server room
Use the computer to hack the keypad to disable the bulletproof glass display case.
Head towards the white light at the end of the bridge!
Let Chavez buzz you in, and then enter the building through the back door.
Hold out until the voting data has been scrambled
The cops have interrupted the drill. Restart it to get inside the safe.
Remember to check the Perk Decks frequently to spend Perk Points.
Find a way past the gates to gain access to the bank's inner rooms
Getting close to enemies can cause them to deal a powerful melee attack.
Protect the pilot and the helicopter from incoming enemy fire while it fills the vault with water.
Bodhi spends a fortune on surfboards.
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to hack the ship control terminal
Wait for Bile to drop the present
Find and enter the shoe store on the first floor.
You will need new equipment in order to breach the final train door.
Open up the Gensec truck and steal the cash
Get to the ziplines by the tunnel entrance.
Apply the drill to the safe and plug the power cord into an outlet. As soon as the drill is done, drag the water hose down to the basement and connect it.
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to activate the barcode reader
Attach the chain to both the gate and to the truck.
You need to leave the area the same way you came in- on the boat down under the wine cellar.
Enter the police station to search for Hajrudin and the evidence.
An escape vehicle is on its way
Jimmy has declared that he will empty the Safe House bar faster than Aldstone can refill it. It's a titanic struggle with an unclear outcome.
Jiro has picked up decent English after spending a couple of years in the US.
The mercs don't want you to scan those test subjects. Keep them off it!
Alarm tripped: Camera detected a hostage
Signal the helicopter pilot with a flare
The escape van will be waiting for you at the main road in a couple of minutes. Stay alive until then!
Let the truck driver know you're ready to continue.
Get the server, plug it in
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to display the mask purchase list
Matt's ride crashed not far from here, hurry up and you'll catch him.
Find the keys to the plane
Use W, A, S, D to move around
Time to start over again, get to the exit and run down the hallway. Time is ticking!
Deploy the door breaker on the custody cell block door.
Alarm tripped: Civilian encountered a saw and called the police
Alarm tripped: Camera detected a hacked computer
The drill has jammed. Repair it.

Sometimes you need to take things to the extreme to earn a good payday, and that's exactly what we're doing this time. Enter the building, find the panic room, and then steal the whole god damn room by using a helicopter.$NL;$NL;¬ª Enter the building$NL;¬ª Locate and dismount the panic room$NL;¬ª Lift out the panic room and escape
Wait for BFD to get into position
Proceed further inside the FBI headquarters.
Bile needs to wait for the smoke to clear, you need to keep the police off the roof until then.
Make sure you get the saw started
Find and steal cocaine from around the compound.
While on Crime.net the more skulls the server or heist has under its name the higher the difficulty.
Secure Vlad's packages under the tree
Wait for the helicopter to pick you up.
Press $BTN_INTERACT; to place mayan gold bar
Collect batteries to power up the weapon.
Disable the anti air system so that the plane can fly in and drop the EMP.
Use the keyboard to reactivate the computer and continue the hacking
Destroy 8 bags of weapons stashed inside the gangster hideout
Different Perk Decks have different effects and attributes. Try them all to see which Perk Deck suits you the best.
Jiro doesn't like the Cloaker. He cuts their head off with his Katana.
You need a keycard to open the vault
Find and start hacking the security system
Disable the anti air defences so that Locke can pick you up.
Find the router boxes for the security system and place the hacking devices.
You need a keycard to enter the hotel room
The guest just lost the keycard. Collect it. You can use it to enter his room.
Some achievements unlock Weapons, Mods or Masks.
Use C4 to breach the construction site walls. Inside is a truck we can use to transport the safes.
Press $BTN_INTERACT; to push in the squirrel symbol
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to pick up recording device
Press $BTN_INTERACT; to push in the dog symbol
Make your way to the basement. Make sure everyone in your team, and the box, are inside the elevator!
Collect the tank and exhaust pipes
Destroy 8 bags of weapons stashed inside the gangster hideout
Grab the C4 from the bag in the armory cage.
You killed a civilian! Trade penalty: 10 seconds.
Wait for Bain's cell to open
They got a sniper in one of the apartments over the courtyard.
The mechanic wants you to collect specific tools from the workshop. Search through the toolboxes and bring it to him!
Pick up the drill the helicopter dropped for you, then mount the drill on the vault door.
Follow Hajrudin out from the custody cell block while fighting off the cops.
Carry the loot to the van
Hack an FBI computer to find the panic room code.
Patience is a virtue! It's gonna take a couple of minutes to fill it up so dig in and stay alive.
Decide on a location where you want to intercept the package. Blow up the train or infiltrate the dockyard? Remember, only Plan A can be done quietly.
Locke's helicopter is waiting to collect the pallets. Ignite the flare to bring him in.
The Brawler Skill Subtree focuses on Melee weapons. Be it fists, knives, or any other melee attack.
Use cover, the enemies can quickly take you down if you are out in the open.
Looking for a weapon mod? Do the Daily Tasks found in the Safe House.
Kill the guard and hide his body.
Follow Bain's instruction on what ingredient to add next and cook a batch of meth.
If you are joining a stealthable heist, ask if it's OK to join before pressing "Ready".
Look around for a bolt cutter that you can use to cut Hajrudin loose.
Looks like we've cleaned the boat empty, time to escape.
Search the motel and kill the Commissar's men.
Find the evidence room located on the opposite side of the building.
Search the area for more loot and throw it into the van or take the bike and leave!
Get to the truck with the gold and get out of here.
Have you tried answering the phone?
Pick up the bag containing the thermite.

The mechanic requires you to collect a chrome skull from a storage room inside the clubhouse. You're gonna need a blowtorch from the mechanic. Get inside the storage room, grab it and deliver it to him!
Use crowbars to jam the vault ventilation
Open the safe in the Oval Office!
Find the way into the mansion by reaching the wine cellar.
Activate the ventilation system to clear the air of gas.
Find a way into Santa's Workshop.
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to place evidence on the floor
When in Stealth, consider if you need to bring Body Bags or ECM Jammers to better fit your team¬¥s composition
Use the hint to locate the correct code and enter it into the keypad.
Get into the lumber yard where the EMP has been dropped.
You cant exit here, all doors are blocked
Three different numbers form the access code for the armory. You need all of them. One is held by the manager, one by the pit boss and the other by the head of security.
Protect the explosives from the cops so they don't disarm them.
You are in casing mode. Mask on to start the heist.
Maximum Force Responders are outfitted with tan or gray body armor. Most weapons won't penetrate it, so aim for the head or flank them.
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to plug in the power
You get detected easier if you are carrying a bag.
Bring the case file to Hoxton
Get into the democrat's office and access his stationary computer
Get to the van and escape from the premises!
Help your downed teammate back up.
Defend the pick-up and keep the engine running
Scarface likes his Safe House room but keeps dreaming of a mansion in Miami.
Secure all of the money in the vault
Set-up all the devices at your station on the roof
The Director's approval is needed to access certain secure files. Locate his office and find a way of approving the files.
Hold out until Bain finds an escape
Drive to the pick up zone
Make sure the town square is cleared of cops.
Light up the fire to burn the evidence.
Climb up the ladder and enter the hold of this Murkywater cargo plane.
Move all the cash to the van
Bob McKendrick is a political veteran of many battles and has gone through many ups and downs during his career.
You need to enter the inner sanctum in order to proceed.
Find the person in charge of the bank's IT department. He should be around the offices on the upper floor.
Grab the shoes and bring them back to the Christmas tree!
Find the police station's custody cell block.
Stand back and enjoy the show!
Dragan spends a lot of time keeping himself in physical shape.
Rust is marked for death by Overkill MC.
The heat is rising inside the vault. Wait for the automatic failsafe to open the door.
Find out where the server room is located and access it.
Connect the power to the BFD
Bain is out cold but Locke has him! Help them reach the helipad before we lose Bain!
The helicopter is taking off, everyone needs to be inside the truck!
They cut the power so you need to get it back on
Find the server room somewhere in the democrats' apartment
Take the engine to the helicopter
Use keycards carried by employees to gain access to open the time locks. If things go loud, override the panels.
Get into the house and meet Hector's cooks
Find clues on how to access the safe! Browse through various laptops which can be found in the West Wing.
Stay alive until the new escape vehicle arrives
Defend the Operations Room while Hoxton searches through the FBI intelligence servers.
The printing is done. Grab the money!
One of the money pallets has broken and cash is scattered about the town. Collect them and put them back on the pallet.
Stay frosty and survive until the helicopter arrives
Get out of here and head to the plane!
Hold $BTN_INTERACT; to use a shaped charge
Use the shape-charges to blast the apartment block door.
Cover Charon while he lockpicks the gate.
Search the arena for the marked supply closets. You will find the C4 stashed inside them.
Go back to the second floor and code the RFID tag for access to the armory.
Bile will pick you up soon, dig in!
Some bags are heavier than others. Make sure that the player with the lowest armor carries the heaviest bag and vice versa.
Take the hard drive with the security footage.
Use the keycard to get into the hotel room. Find the vent and start pumping sleeping gas into the shaft. This will put the guards in the Security Center to sleep.
Wait for the negotiations to end
Subdue Ralph and get the keycard from him.
Tasers can pin down your teammates, kill the Taser to help your teammates.
Find and subdue the FBI boss
Get all of the crew into the rubber boat!
The Tank Skill Subtree makes you stronger and more resilient.
The saw has stopped. Restart it!
Connect the winch hook to the drill.
The helicopter is on its way, hold out until it arrives.
SWAT Van Turrets repair themselves twice -- each time after their shield breaks.
Go inside and inspect the vault.
Place the C4 charges on the roof, floor 4 and 5.
Take another engine to the helicopter
Escape via the zip line on the roof next to the insertion point
Find your way to the armory in guards' locker room. That is where you will collect the C4.
Search the forest for any loot
Jiro's body is full of traditional Yakuza tattoos.
Get the USB stick from the head of security
Enter Garrett's office by disabling the security panel by his door!
Turn off all coolent systems for the servers. That should overheat them.
Find a way inside the mansion walls.
Open up the Gensec truck and steal the gold
You need to locate the code to the wine cellar keypad.
Jiro's relationship to American food is marked more by tolerance than appreciation.
Clear a path for the truck
To advance deeper into the Inner Sanctum, you need to find the secret path.
Make it back to the previous courtyard and wait for Bain's instructions
Bain is somewhere in Cell Block A, find it.
Find and enter the correct symbols
Gain access to the Murkywater compound. Descend from the roofs, or use the ziplines.
Make your way to the vault.
Clover's name is a reference to her being a lucky heister. And she is.
Use the correct tools to open the crate.
Police officers will not attempt to repossess loot that has not yet been bagged.
Throw the part you've found into the mechanic's truck!
We need to get through that gate, the BCI is on the other side.
There should be fertilizer somewhere in the wine cellar.
Look for a whiteboard in this part of the office. It contains important information.
Use your keycard to activate the prison door panel or the escape panel.
Use the zip-line to get to the crane
Use the FBI boss to get past the retinal scanner on the Panic Room door by leading him to it.
Drill the door to the office
Search the bikers clubhouse for the briefing room and gain access to it.
Get to the roof and escape!
You can now grab the loot for the Dentist. Look for a golden chest.
You need to get the keys to steal Buluc's cars.
Chains used to be a military man but he didn't fit in. As a bank robber, he's a natural.
Light a flare on the roof to signal Bile to drop some C4 on the roof using his helicopter.
Open the containers and look for the bomb case.
You need to find the door to the inner sanctum.
The Artful Dodger Skill Subtree focuses on speed, and the ability to dodge gunfire if you have good Concealment.
Answer the phone to make the trade
Bag all the loot you can find in the vault.
The BFD is drilling into the vault. Wait for her, and keep the cops away.
Do you find it hard to find ammo boxes when you are out of ammo? You can turn on outlines for ammo, arrows and Throwables in the settings menu.
Press $BTN_INTERACT; to turn on ECM feedback
Make your way further into the compound.
Burn a hole into the wagon
Gage has an extensive net of contacts around the world, allowing him to procure the very best hardware available.
Find a saw blade and attach it to the saw to continue destroying weapons
Our Insider is heading from the second floor to the gate. She will be ready to lead you through them. Act casual and don't draw any attention to yourselves!
Use the passwords Charon gave you and hack into the manifest.
Destroy the turret on the armored vehicle.
Investigate the storage room, it's supposed to have the car keys. Let's see what security they have.
Open Buluc's safe so you can steal his contact list.
Locate all of the different parts of the EMP bomb.
Pick up the bags containing the drill parts and bring them to the vault.
Gain access to the vault doors
Move all the goats to the truck and load them into the cage.
Find and disable the security boxes which control Garrett's security panel.
Get rid of all the law enforcers on the roof.
Gather the paintings in a pile. They will make a nice bonfire.
Open up the Gensec truck and steal its contents
Use the keyboard to reactivate the computer and continue the hacking.
Wait at the bank until Vlad's brother-in-law arrives.
Press $BTN_INTERACT; to push in the turtle symbol
Turn off the water to the sprinkler system so that the fire can burn the evidence.
Use a drill to get inside the evidence room. Make sure you defend the drill against the cops.

Deep inside the projects there's a fortified building, the headquarters of a local gang running a lucrative drugs operation. In this building there's a panic room bolted to the floor - and inside the panic room there's a fortune in cash. $NL; $NL;Getting into the building is easy, but the panic room is a tougher nut to crack. It'll take days to cut it open, and you don't have that much time. So if you can't get in, how are you going to get to all that money? The answer is simple: steal the whole room.
A good team will have both Ammo Bags and Doctor Bags with them on the heist.

While extra loot is nice, we need to take his money. Find the safe with the money in it. Its gotta be somewhere!
Listen to the Contract Broker - he will tell you what to do next.
You will get a bonus for every surviving crew member during the success screen.
Flashbangs can be destroyed after landing on the ground by shooting at them, or even by attacking them with a Melee weapon.
Some doors can be shot open by firing at their locks.
Civilians will not notice broken cameras or loot bags. However, they will notice Body Bags.
Body Bags can be thrown into deep water or into dumpsters in order to safely hide them.
ECM Jammers will temporarily convert SWAT Van Turrets to your side.
A low Detection Rate can be used in a gunfight with the Ghost Skill Tree. Just because someone's not wearing armor, doesn't mean they can't hold their own in a fight.
The ECM Feedback function of ECM Jammers regenerates every 4 minutes.
Some enemies use body armor and you need to aim for their heads.
The SWAT Van Turret's weakness is the reflective camera below the gun. Aim at it for maximum damage output.
Most windows can be picked open. Breaking them will make lots of noise, and even civilians will be suspicious if they see broken glass.
Even suppressed saws make a little bit of noise. Be wary of nearby people.
Know your enemy. Cloakers have distinct green, glowing night vision goggles on, and make a noise when they're charging at you. You can also hear a static noise when they arrive at the scene.
ECM Jammers temporarily disable cameras. Don't be afraid to use one to blind the Camera Operator when you're in a tight spot.
Cameras can't detect noise, but they'll still sound the alarm if they see suspicious activity for too long.
If a camera sees suspicious activity, there's no stopping the alarm.
Melee weapons are always silent. If you don't have a suppressor, this is your best friend for silent takedowns.
Guards will be able to tell you're behind them if you get too close. Keep some distance when you're tailing them.
For as long as Captain Winters is present, the police will not stop the assault.
The "Threat" weapon stat indicates the chance of cops avoiding fire and searching cover when you fire your gun. The higher the number, the more threatening the weapon is per shot
Almost all drills have a chance to break on their own. Be sure to keep a close eye on them.
Purchasing Assets in the Loadout or Preplanning screen can be a great help during the heist. Study them closely.
Know your enemy. The Medic wears bright red clothes and can quickly be identified in a crowd.
When one of your teammates has been downed, ask the rest of your team to cover you while you revive him.
While sawing doors and deposit boxes is the fastest way to open them - it's also very loud. Use the silent motor to reduce its noise.
Hostages are your lifelines. Keep them secured, away from the action, and away from cops.
Trip mines can be placed anywhere, such as vents where Cloakers spawn, or a room you don't want cops to enter.
Be careful of tossing Grenades at cops. They can easily shoot it out of the air.
If you're the last one standing - staying alive has much more importance than the objective.
Shotguns can take down multiple cops in a single shot. Aim for a crowd and fire away.
Know your enemy. There are two different kinds of Shields units, some are equipped with lights and SMGs, and the others carries a pistol.
Sniper Rifles can shoot through Shields and armor, and even multiple enemies.
Know your enemy. Tasers can be identified by their dark blue and yellow armor.
Know your enemy. The Snipers give away their position by their laser sights.
Know your enemy. The SWAT turret can be identified by being attached to a huge SWAT van.
Are you low on ammo? Look around on the ground, because dead cops drop ammo boxes.
The Medic Skill Subtree is all about keeping you and your fellow heisters healthy and alive.
The Controller Skill Subtree is focused on capturing and controlling hostages. Including law enforcers.
The Shotgunner Skill Subtree provides massive boosts when using Shotguns.
The Ammo Specialist Skill Subtree is focused around ammunition. It also has skills to improve the OVE9000 Saw.
The Oppressor Skill Subtree focuses boost your auto-fire weapons, making them even more effective.
The Revenant Skill Subtree is all about survival during worst case scenarios.
Don't leave bags unattended - cops may be inclined to steal your precious loot.
Saws use ammo quickly. Bring Ammo Bags to increase their usage.
Red outlines around an enemy during a Loud heist indicates that they are a Special Enemy of some sorts.
Bulldozers have a plate that protect their faces. You need to shoot away the plate before you can hand out headshots.
Tasing an enemy makes them a lot easier to Dominate.
A silencer is very helpful when trying to sneakily complete a heist so your gunshot can't be heard.
The higher the Threat Level of your weapons, the more likely it is that enemies will try to dodge.
Mind your surroundings, if you kill a Civilian you will pay a penalty from your spending cash.
You can press the "Shout/Interact" button to try to force a police officer to surrender and become a hostage.
Is your screen turning grey? You should probably use a Doctor Bag.
A Doctor Bag will refill your lives and a First Aid Kit will only refill your health.
If your teammates have been taken into custody you need a hostage or a dominated cop to be able to trade and get your teammate back.
You can't trade a hostage during an assault, you need to wait until the assault is over.
Doctor Bags will give three lives back, if you only been downed once it's better to use a First Aid Kit.
Watch out for Cloakers - they attack when you least expect it. So beware of their sound.
Guards will become suspicious about a destroyed camera. Civilians, on the other hand, don't care.
Play with your teammates and support them - on your own, you stand less of a chance to survive.
Bulldozers can't be stunned or staggered in any way.
Cloakers are not affected by the Feedback Loop of an ECM Jammer.
Sniper Rifles can penetrate thin walls. Use this to your advantage.
Just because you're not masked up, doesn't mean you're invisible. Civilians might not be able to tell you're packing heat, but guards and cameras will.
Bulldozers can come charging at you when you least expect it. Stay on your toes.
A skilled Mastermind can convert cops to your side by first taking them hostage.
Going for optional loot usually gives you more experience and money.
Getting kicked by a Cloaker or tased by Taser does not count towards your total amount times you are allowed to go down.
Flashbangs will beep and blink red before they detonate.
Remember a lone player is an easy target for Cloakers.
Using Feedback on an ECM Jammer can stun some cops in the vicinity for a short duration.
Almost every Stealth heist has a Camera Operator, be sure to kill him so cameras are no longer a problem.
ECM Jammers will block the guard's radios, civilian cellphones and cameras so they can't alert the cops to your presence while the ECM jammer is active.
Don't leave bodies around in Stealth, use a Body Bag to move them where they can't be seen.
Don't run out of cover without checking if Snipers are present as they could deplete your health even with a full armor.
To easily dominate a cop, try to deal some damage before shouting at them.
Crouching will help you avoid detection in Stealth.
Killing a guard in a cam room will let you freely roam without worrying about the cameras - but roaming guards still can detect you.
Shotgun AP Rounds will pierce through both Shields and cops' armor.
If you want to admire your weapon while in a heist, you can inspect it by pressing "INSPECT WEAPON" button.
Got a gadget? Turn it on by pressing the "GADGET ON/OFF" button.
On Crime.net you can bet your Offshore money for an "Offshore Payday".
Your weapons, skills, armor and Perk Deck all interact differently - take the time to read about their effects.
You can use the FBI files from the game menu to read about your teammates.
The game has several difficulty levels. Find one that fits you.
More loot means more rewards but could also mean higher risk.
Take a look at all the stats of a weapon. High damage is not always the most efficient depending on your playstyle.
Don't expect that your heist will be the same if you replay it as vaults, assets and key items are randomized and will be at different locations each time you play it.
Communicate with your teammates - teamwork is key to survival.
Join the PAYDAY 2 community on the Steam Store Page to gain access to some extra free and unique content.
Shield units can block bullets, try to work together to flank them or use armor piercing bullets.
Cleaner Costs are immediately deducted from your Spending Cash, so restarting a heist will not revert Cleaner Costs.
Many weapons have an extended reload time if there are no bullets left in the magazine.
The Elephant will reward you for doing things quietly, but going loud is an option when in a pinch.
Vlad's jobs will offer a mix of Stealth and Loud combat, be ready for anything.
Profiles allow you to save your Loadout in order for you to quickly adjust your gear to the situation when being in the Loadout screen.
ZEAL units are the toughest that the DHS has to offer, and are deployed only at the Death Sentence difficulty.
You can select up to four preferred heisters, in case one of them is already taken by another player.
Skill points can be reallocated with no cost. Experiment and test for yourself.
It is better to have multiple Skill Sets that are good at different things, than to have one Skill Set that tries to do a bit of everything.
Double the fun. Use Akimbo weapons to wield two pistols or SMGs.
Visit the FBI files to read about the Payday Gang, Special Enforcers and the Heists.
The Butcher's Gun Trade business reaches all around the globe. She has her eyes on one-of-a-kind weaponry to steal and she knows how to settle a score.
Scarface is proud of his Cuban origins even though he often professes his dislike of the island.
Scarface spends a fortune on furniture and decorations.
Hoxton spends a fortune on beer.
Hoxton got his nickname from being arrested in the district of Hoxton, Shoreditch, London.
Sydney spends a fortune on art materials.
Jimmy is crazy. Really crazy. He offers a few jobs against Akan and his army of Russian mercenaries.
John Wick really likes his car.
John Wick is sometimes called Baba Yaga, after a Slavic folklore figure.
Bain spends a fortune on bribes and informants.
Everyone knows Bain's name. No one knows his identity.
Dallas is the informal leader of the Payday Gang.
Dallas is not from Texas, he's from Chicago.
Dallas doesn't like going to the dentist.
Wolf spends a fortune on power tools.
Wolf used to work as a game developer in Sweden.
Wolf is not a healthy human being.
Jimmy once challenged Bonnie to a drinking competition, but they had to interrupt after it nearly ended in violence.
Bodhi isn't just in it for the money.
Bodhi is into crazy stunts like extreme skydiving.
Chains spends a fortune on guns.
Chains often acts and talks like he's impervious to bullets. Perhaps he is.
Chains is sometimes in a pickle.
Clover has had a long and complicated relationship with Hoxton, since before the Payday Gang. They get on well now, though.
Clover is a fan of The Walking Dead.
Houston spends a fortune on cars.
Houston has many problems, but the cops ain't one.
Houston thinks Hoxton is an idiot.
Houston likes to keep an eye on the escape van, making sure it's in good shape.
Bonnie spends a fortune on whisky.
Bonnie probably gambles too much. But it wouldn't be safe to tell her that.
Captain Winters is not a kind leader.
Captain Winters used to be in the Military Police before he joined GenSec.
Rust spends a fortune on his bike.
Rust would probably kill anyone who damaged his bike.
Sokol spends a fortune on ice hockey gear.
Sokol watches the Russian hockey league every week.
Sokol still maintains the physique of a professional athlete.
Sokol enjoys the fact that he still has fans in Russia from his ice hockey days.
Jiro spends a fortune on sword maintenance.
Dragan spends a fortune on healthy food.
Aldstone spends a fortune on specially imported tea.
Aldstone's first name is unknown to all the heisters except Hoxton, who never uses it.
Aldstone was once married, but it didn't end happily.
Aldstone doesn't like Hoxton's choice of profession, but as a loyal and professional butler he stoically accepts it.
Gage spends a fortune on bribing customs officials.
Gage doesn't like everything about his job, but he does have a passion for the merchandise.
Gage is often underestimated, something which he uses to his advantage.
Bob McKendrick spends a fortune on influence-peddling.
Bob McKendrick is not to be underestimated.
Bodhi despises Tasers. Try shooting one with the Platypus Sniper Rifle when playing as him.
No animals were hurt during the making of the Goat Simulator Heist.
Hector is a man of serious business. He doesn't like his operations in D.C. to be trampled on. Expect long loud heists from this guy.
The Dentist's jobs require careful planning and finesse. If you think you're ready, give him a call.
The Classics. These jobs were the biggest things the gang's ever done. Let's say we see if they still have what it takes?
Make your way further along the bridge and locate the prison convoy.
Locate the prisoner! He's in one of the trucks. Saw the doors open.
Escort the prisoner to the top of the right tower. When he's at the top, strap him down in the chair and send him skyward with the balloon.

Make it to the Bridge Pillar and take the stairs to the waiting scuba gear.

Get Matt back to Jake's parking lot. You will get further instructions when you're there.

Continue chasing Matt. Capture him alive!
Press jump to be released from custody
